abstract: Chicago Blackhawks celebrate their Stanley Cup championship with parade in downtown Chicago and rally at Soldier Field; other hockey news noted.
lead_paragraph: Thousands of fans turned out Thursday to cheer the Blackhawks as they celebrated their third Stanley Cup championship.

headline.main: Fans Cheer Blackhawks at Rally in Chicago

snippet: Thousands of fans turned out Thursday to cheer the Blackhawks as they celebrated their third Stanley Cup championship.
